entries.journal_entry_description: Borantok and his friends got a bit too rowdy at the Kachirho cantina last night, got into a fight with some Rodians, and accidentally killed them all. The problem is that the Rodians were members of the nobility and this could cause an interplanetary incident. Borantok wants you to find where they hid the bodies of the Rodians and dispose of them.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Borantok doesn't remember where he and his friends hid the corpses. All he knows is that they are somewhere in Kachirho and suggests that you start your search there.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You will need to search around Kachirho and in all the buildings to see if you can find where he hid the corpses of the Rodians. There are two of them hidden somewhere in town.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Travel to the Rryatt Trail and meet Negal on the first level. Talk to him and get him to hide the bodies for you.
